serviceAccountIssuers.description: Configuration of the identifier of the service account token issuer. For each issuer, you must specify either `url`, `clusterDomainPrefix` or `templateName`. The first issuer is used by Kubernetes to issue tokens, while the second and further issuers, if any, are trusted regarding tokens. Specifying multiple issuers can make sense for migrations.
